direction.raw_text: Professor Spaulding? I can't apologize enough for barging in like this. The Professor is not only thrown by the interruption, but by Drew's particularly bizarre, barefoot look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Please. It looks like I'm taking the red-eye now anyway. Drew shuts the door and then is startled when she gets a face full of Parker, already there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Parker?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, Parker. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, the Professor and I have had a wonderful talk about how important this program is to me and how it was my sister, Drew, who screwed things up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm having a little trouble following this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You were... being me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Would you like to sit down? Seeing her plan to help Drew go awry, poor Parker's lip trembles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When I saw them take you to jail...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jail?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... I didn't think you'd make it. I knew I wouldn't be any good at it, but I figured at least there was a chance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's... sweet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're not mad?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm so sorry for today. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's okay.    But let's talk about it later.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please.    Go right ahead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Parker, consider, just for a moment, whether this is the appropriate time and place.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, I considered.     What I want to say is, I didn't    purposefully set out to ruin your    day, but that doesn't mean I'm not    a little... jealous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jealous?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not like you. I don't have your intensity, your focus, your...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fashion sense?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just mean, maybe, even if I don't intend to, maybe that jealousy, you know, gets in the way sometimes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You mean subliminally you're undermining me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know if I'd get that technical about it. But yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, thank you for saying that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're welcome. (beat) Aren't you going to confess now? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Confess what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's got to be something. Like how you lost your shoes?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How you're secretly jealous of me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why would I be jealous of you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, let me see. Because I don't have a stick up my butt? Because I know how to have fun? Because I'm spontaneous and creative and men are all my love slaves? Drew stops, ponders this deeply.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nope. Then she smiles, only a teensy bit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, maybe about the love slaves. This is the first moment in a long time when the sisters share a smile. Drew turns to the Professor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Professor, I'm Drew MacLeod.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you certain?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wanted more than anything in the world to be a part of your program. I still do. But I failed. I didn't follow the rules. And honestly, before today, I didn't know how I was going to live with that. How to live with failure. I'm not good at it. I haven't done it much. But today I realized that I've lived in fear of it too long. (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hope my application was a strong one and I came here today to ask your indulgence and to place my name back into consideration. If you won't, I'll understand. Better yet, I'll get over it. Maybe I shouldn't be in such a hurry after all. Maybe it would be best for me to just take this... Drew takes her DAYBOOK from Parker and drops it in the wastebasket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... and lighten up. Parker looks horrified at the sight of Drew's daybook in the trash and fishes it out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks for your time. Sorry if you missed your plane. He shakes her hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was worth it, I assure you. Now, could you clear up one thing for me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's this about jail?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks. The sisters hug, but we GO... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED: CLOSE ON PARKER -- EYES WIDE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sis?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gotta go. Parker grabs Warren by the hand and blasts around the corner just as... Charley MacLeod pulls up in his truck and parks half on, half off the curb. He leans over, waving to Drew.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, baby! Drew goes over to the truck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was in the city. I tried to call you. Thought you might want a ride home.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that a new outfit?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.     Hey, one minute, 'kay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure. Drew goes back to Jim.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're welcome.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: uh... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You want to maybe... get together?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: First I want to take a shower. For about a week. Drew leans over and kisses him on the cheek.         Then she reaches into her bag and pulls out a card.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Call me, okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have a card? Aren't you in high school? She smiles, shrugs and climbs in her dad's truck. They pull away, leaving Jim waving. When they're out of sight, Parker and Warren come back around the corner of the building.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, man. I'm doomed.     I'll never get home before them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure you will. Warren pulls out a CELL PHONE, hits speed dial.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad?   Hey.   I need a favor. INT. HELICOPTER - DAY Passing over the City, Warren and Parker are strapped in, headphones on, and have to talk above the DIN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Warren, something tells me you're spoiled!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes!   But in a good way!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Girls? Quinn steps in, grimfaced.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How naive do you think I am? The Girls share a look.       Busted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We, uh, don't think you're naive, Mom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Honestly, it was all an accident. Quinn holds out her hand revealing a BELLY RING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know what this is. There's almost a palpable sense of relief between the girls. They BOTH LOOK DOWN and pull up their shirts -- Parker's not the only one who has her naval pierced -- Drew does, too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Parker, I'm disappointed you'd do something like this without consulting me, but Drew? What got into you? Do you know how unhygienic those places are?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was... spontaneous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. Obviously. Oh, by the way... She holds out her other hand, which has an envelope.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This came in the mail. They stare at the envelope -- NYU ADMISSIONS DEPARTMENT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So?   Open it. There's a HONK. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: : DREW staring at her INK-STAINED FINGERS as Hogan finishes fingerprinting her other hand. (CONTINUED)

dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (how in the world would this woman know?)

dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: : INT. GIRLS' BATHROOM - EVENING Both girls are putting on makeup, getting ready to go out. Everything appears the same as before, Drew's side neat and clean, Parker's a wreck. (CONTINUED)
